name: web3-jsonrpc-gateway
description: A Web3 provider that handles accounts on its own but delegates chain queries to a 3rd party service

scripts.avalanche:mainnet: cross-env-shell ETHERS_ALWAYS_SYNCED=true ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_PRICE=true ETHERS_GAS_PRICE=150000000000 ETHERS_GAS_PRICE_FACTOR=1.25 ETHERS_MOCK_FILTERS=true node dist/src/bin/ethers https://api.avax.network/ext/bc/C/rpc 9533
scripts.avalanche:testnet: cross-env-shell ETHERS_ALWAYS_SYNCED=true ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_PRICE=true ETHERS_GAS_PRICE=50000000000 ETHERS_GAS_PRICE_FACTOR=1.0 ETHERS_MOCK_FILTERS=true node dist/src/bin/ethers https://api.avax-test.network/ext/bc/C/rpc 8533
scripts.conflux:testnet: cross-env-shell CONFLUX_ESTIMATE_GAS_PRICE=true CONFLUX_GAS_PRICE=3000 node dist/src/bin/conflux https://test.confluxrpc.com 1 8540
scripts.conflux:mainnet: cross-env-shell CONFLUX_ESTIMATE_GAS_PRICE=true CONFLUX_GAS_PRICE=30000000000 node dist/src/bin/conflux https://main.confluxrpc.com 1029 9540
scripts.cronos:testnet: cross-env-shell ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_PRICE=true ETHERS_GAS_PRICE=2000000000000 node dist/src/bin/ethers https://evm-t3.cronos.org/ 8530
scripts.harmony:testnet#0: cross-env-shell ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_PRICE=true ETHERS_GAS_PRICE=25000000000 node dist/src/bin/ethers https://api.s0.b.hmny.io 8534
scripts.metis:rinkeby: cross-env-shell ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_PRICE=false ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_LIMIT=true ETHERS_GAS_LIMIT=30000000 node dist/src/bin/ethers https://stardust.metis.io/?owner=588 8536
scripts.metis:mainnet: cross-env-shell ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_PRICE=false ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_LIMIT=true ETHERS_GAS_LIMIT=50000000 node dist/src/bin/ethers https://andromeda.metis.io/?owner=1088 9536
scripts.moonbeam:moonbase: cross-env-shell ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_PRICE=false ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_LIMIT=false ETHERS_GAS_PRICE=3000000000 ETHERS_GAS_LIMIT=8000000 ETHERS_MOCK_FILTERS=true node dist/src/bin/ethers https://rpc.api.moonbase.moonbeam.network 8531
scripts.moonbeam:mainnet: cross-env-shell ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_PRICE=false ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_LIMIT=false ETHERS_GAS_PRICE=15000000000 ETHERS_GAS_LIMIT=8000000 ETHERS_MOCK_FILTERS=true node dist/src/bin/ethers https://rpc.api.moonbeam.network 9531
scripts.polygon:goerli: cross-env-shell ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_PRICE=true ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_LIMIT=false ETHERS_GAS_PRICE=100000000000 node dist/src/bin/ethers https://matic-mumbai.chainstacklabs.com 8535
scripts.polygon:mainnet: cross-env-shell ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_PRICE=true ETHERS_ESTIMATE_GAS_LIMIT=false ETHERS_GAS_PRICE=100000000000 node dist/src/bin/ethers https://rpc-mainnet.maticvigil.com 9535
